title: Obama Turns 60
sub_head: The former president rejects the latest Covid panic, but still battles community organizers in Chicago.
body:
America’s 44th president is turning 60 this week. This column joins millions around the world in wishing Barack Obama a happy birthday and applauds his determined avoidance of trendy Covid panic in favor of a beachfront celebration with friends and admirers.
Unfortunately back in Chicago a new controversy surrounding his planned Obama Presidential Center threatens to cast a pall over the joyous gathering. The Obama Foundation and some community organizers are now arguing over exactly how many live trees in historic Jackson Park will be cut down to make way for the architectural celebration of Mr. Obama. The dispute has raised an important ecological question: What would Tracy Stone-Manning do?
